messages.title: ONLY LABOUR WILL GIVE THE NHS THE FUNDING IT NEEDS.
messages.content: THE TORIES HAVE PUSHED THE NHS INTO CRISIS. Under the Tories, the NHS and social care have been pushed into a state of emergency. Waiting lists have soared, A&Es are overcrowded and hospital trusts are in financial crisis.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will take one million people off NHS waiting lists by guaranteeing access to treatment within 18 weeks. Immediately halt all Tory hospital closure plans and have patients be seen in A&E within four hours.
Labour will ensure safe staffing levels, helping halt the NHS workforce crisis, increase pay for NHS workers, and give NHS workers the pay they deserve.
Labour will scrap the unfair pay cap and fully fund education to prepare our NHS staff to be the best in the world.
Labour will make parking at NHS hospitals free for patients, visitors, and NHS staff.

issues.education: Scrap the unfair pay cap and fully fund education to prepare our NHS staff to be the best in the world.
issues.health: Under the Tories, the NHS and social care have been pushed into a state of emergency. Waiting lists have soared, A&Es are overcrowded and hospital trusts are in financial crisis.

images.caption: The NHS was created to care for us all. Only Labour will care for the NHS.
